work.position: First Full-Stack Engineer, Now Infrastructure Engineer
highlights: Built a tagging framework for internal sales reps using Vue, Typescript, and PostgreSQL
Developed "insights" page & microservice for all businesses to view aggregated metrics
Infrastructure-related jobs: Migrating projects from App Engine to Kubernetes, Improving Jenkins pipelines
Synchronized Google Groups with LDAP for remote access control using Goland, Terraform, and LDAP
Researched artificial intelligence capabilities of competing companies for finding product market fit
Taught a reinforcement learning lecture with the head of machine learning
Developed a general drift monitoring application to be used on any model in Capital One using Flask (Python)
Constructed a model to predict SQL table updates and alert subscribers if the table wasn't updated as expected using Python
Built Qlik dashboards for performance evaluation of 4,000 employees. Increased read time using caching by 40x using Python!
Mantained Qlik dashboard for client's financial department containing over 20 data sources

projects.name: Canadian Trademark Competitive Intelligence
projects.description: Created a database of all filed Canadian trademarks from XML and created dashboards with broad and granular metrics. Sold project to Gowling WLG

projects.name: Sonos Timer
projects.description: Developed a script using Sonos API to queue up a set playlist and play after N minutes
